title: Friendship or Foul Play: Taylor Takes Her Shot
description: A heartwarming story about friendship, jealousy, and what it means to be part of a team.Taylor is a rising basketball star determined to win the most valuable player award. But when a talented new student joins the team, life gets a lot more complicated. Positions are challenged and friendships are tested.How can she focus on basketball? Her parents are fighting, her brother is a pain, and there’s a toddler and puppy to deal with. Everything is a priority, except for her.As she struggles through challenging new situations, strained friendships, and troubles at home, can Taylor discover how to put her team first and still win?Friendship or Foul Play is an exciting, heartwarming story about a girl struggling to learn what being part of a team (and a family) really means. It’s a contemporary coming of age chapter book, ideal for middle grade readers aged 8-12.
author: Paul Breau
